summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the Seattle Trade Center by Ordinance 106335 as amended by Ordinance 111129, to construct, maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across Alaskan Way, between Clay and Cedar Streets, by amending Section 9 thereof, establishing an annual fee for 1984, providing for the annual fee at the beginning of the third year, and providing for acceptance of the conditions.
